summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Replat of J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 41st Avenue North and 42nd Avenue North, from East Garfield Street to East Blaine Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9613 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
